div.bibl: Die Fackel, Sunday edition of the Chicagoer A. Z. July 25, 1880. (Advertisement)PICNIC

body.p: The North Side Section of the Mutual Benefit Society of Chicago in Fritz's Grove Clybourn Ave and Center Street Sunday, August 1, 1880.

Good concert and dance music and other entertainment as well as a first class accommodation will be provided. With favorable weather the rising of a giant balloon will take place. In the evening large fireworks.
Cars of Webster Avenue will reach the place.
